titleInfo.title: Mass-analysed ion kinetic energy spectra and collisional activation spectra of cluster ions of methly 2,3,4,6-tetra-o-methly-d-hexopyranosides with ammonia and methylamine

Organic Mass Spectrometry 26 (9): 809-810.
